about_the_game:
Feline Shenanigans is a family friendly survival horror game where you play as Mathias Shultz who takes on a ten thousand dollar gig offered by a Mr. and Mrs. RoffleBurger. The gig that the RoffleBurger couple offer is to babysit their adorable cat family while they go out on vacation. But as soon as Mathias takes on the job, he begins to realize that he had just made the biggest mistake of his life! Mathias realizes that these cats aren't just any ordinary cats, but rather cats that are psychotic and are determined to use their supernatural abilities to eliminate Mathias from the fabric of existence! But Mathias being as foolish as he is, he is willing to risk his mental and physical well being for the sake of ten thousand dollars.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/explodegiph.gif

You must survive a whole week defending yourself against this vengeful cat family. In this game you will get to meet each cat named: Koobu, Weex Moo Moo, Creamsicle, Dan, Wumbo and a wild baby lynx. Each of these cats have their unique style and abilities of trying to take you down. You must be smart, fast, clever, cunning and be willing to make full use of your given tools in order to survive each day of the week.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/lynxgiph.gif

Will you do whatever it takes to go to the summer vacation of your dreams?

CONTROLS:
WASD to move.
SHIFT to sprint.
E to interact with objects.
Left mouse button to shoot.
Right mouse button to aim.

name: Feline Shenanigans Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Mathias Schultz is a dude looking to make some extra dough to afford a vacation to Thailand. He accepts a job offer to babysit a family of cats while the owners are on vacation. But to Mathias's surprise, The cat's stir up quite the ruckus and it's up to Mathias to survive the frightening ordeal.
